channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-5286] Fail to drop an invalid table when using the data source API
item.description:
Example

CREATE TABLE jsonTable
USING org.apache.spark.sql.json.DefaultSource
OPTIONS (
  path 'it is not a path at all!'
)

DROP TABLE jsonTable

We will get 

[info]   com.google.common.util.concurrent.UncheckedExecutionException: org.apache.hadoop.mapred.InvalidInputException: Input path does not exist: file:/Users/yhuai/Projects/Spark/spark/sql/hive/it is not a path at all!

item.summary: Fail to drop an invalid table when using the data source API

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
User 'yhuai' has created a pull request for this issue:
https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/4076

Issue resolved by pull request 4076
https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/4076
I am reopen this issue because we need to catch all Throwables instead of just Exceptions.

User 'yhuai' has created a pull request for this issue:
https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/4755

Issue resolved by pull request 4755
https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/4755
